Subject: EPP agent high system memory consumption from file tracing
Description:
Hello,
We have several Windows EPP agents consuming 1-50GB of RAM. Traced the issue to file tracing on D and F drive partitions hosting a very heavy read/write SCADA application. 
Didnâ€™t see a way to globally exclude D and F (non C drive) partitions from file tracing so I created global file extension tracing exclusions. This lowered the system memory on several hosts to 1-2GB, but that is still significantly higher than other Windows hosts in our environment. Other hosts with D and F drives hosting this SCADA application are still consuming significant system memory. The EPP server (and in turn our Splunk server) are also getting filled up with excessive logs from these 6 hosts. Ended up just disabling file tracing on these 6 hosts, but would like to troubleshoot this issue further via screenshare.
